text: These hypocrites watch you closely: if victory is granted to you by Allah, they will say: ´Were we not with you?´ And were the unbelievers to gain the upper hand, they will say: ´Did we not have mastery over you, and yet we protected you from the believers?´ It is Allah Who will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection, and He will not allow the unbelievers, in any way, to gain advantage over the believers
